name: Crazy Cat Lady: Full Throttle: Reloaded with a Revengence(?)
name_original: Crazy Cat Lady: Full Throttle: Reloaded with a Revengence(?)
description:
Description-

Crazy Cat Lady is an survival action game that tells the story of helpless cats escaping a burning building with the help of a lady.

In Crazy Cat Lady you play Peggy, in a NYC high-rise condo where the building is on fire.

Your adventure begins as Old Ms. Peggy goes down the burning building, trying to collect the cats from each floor, but the smoke will soon become denser and hotter as she loses oxygen, exiting the building while saving as many cats as she can. From the face of Peggy to the small appliances that you can knock down, everything was made by the team within the limited hours of the game jam.

As you progress down the building, there are even more cats that Peggy can rescue but her oxygen depletes even faster.

Features-
  • Explore a beautiful Blender3D world: Play as the muse riding a giant three tailed fox, lost in a fantasy 3D world
  • More than just Escaping: Save cats stuck in the rooms of the floor, collect Oxygen refills so you can live longer
  • Keyboard or Analog Stick: You can use a standard WASD buttons of your keyboard, but the game works way better with an analog joystick
  • Adaptive difficulty: You can change the difficulty of the game to get a higher score
  • Competitive Arena Mode: Challenge other players and your and comment your score or tweet to us @ld40catlady
  • Mystery: Finish the game to find out who set the fire!

Don’t forget to let us know if you love this game, we might just build it in AR for Android and iPhones!
